response.original_title: TR calls on neighbors at Christmas, 1917
response.overview: Opening scene of a man, woman, and two children with presents walking up to a house in Oyster Bay, N.Y.; one child enters house, comes back out, then the woman enters; two older girls stand in doorway; TR, carrying a present, walks up to the house; final scene is of TR talking with group as they all pose while a small girl peeks out of the door.
response.title: TR calls on neighbors at Christmas, 1917

titles.title: Theodore Roosevelt calls on neighbors at Christmas, 1917
